name: Bridge Hypothesis 02A 0002B
description:
From the Bridge Hypothesis series. In Norse mythology Bifrost was the bridge between the mortal world and that of the gods, fashioned as a burning rainbow or manifested as the Aurora Borealis. Here, geometric forms recall the structures of bridges and roads, reimagined as Technicolor pathways. 

6kpx PNG, edition of 8+1 AP. Marius Watz, @mariuswatz 2010.
